synopsis.text: Riko's father, Kagetora Aida, assembles a formidable basketball team in response to the humiliating defeat of a Japanese college-level team at the hands of Jabberwock, an American street basketball team. After the crushing loss, Jabberwock's players deride the quality of Japanese basketball, igniting Kagetora's fury. Determined to restore the honor of Japanese basketball, he gathers the Generation of Miracles, along with Kuroko Tetsuya and Kagami Taiga, to form Team Vorpal Swords. As second-year students, Kuroko and Kagami join forces with their former rivals to challenge Jabberwock in a highly anticipated rematch. With pride and redemption on the line, the ultimate dream team aims to prove the true potential of Japanese basketball.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
